title: Searching a top laner for an upcoming tournament
body:
Hey guys,

we are currently searching for a plat 3+ top laner, that can complete our team for the upcoming Dr. Pepper tournament on the 15.06
We are all between Dia and plat and all main their role. we hope u can fulfill our needs.

Just contact me ING: KiraSaidenMaki

replies.body: hi im mian toplane , currently im platin 2 (last season platin 1 ) . Im 17 years old , im from germany , i speak german and english . hope i can fill in ur team
